\subsection{Detailed Description}
The routines in this group provide access to information in documentation comments. These facilities are distinct from the core and may be subject to their own schedule of stability and deprecation.

\subsubsection{\texorpdfstring{C\+X\+Comment\+Kind}{CXCommentKind}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily enum \mbox{\hyperlink{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_ga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221}{C\+X\+Comment\+Kind}}}



Describes the type of the comment A\+ST node ({\ttfamily \mbox{\hyperlink{structCXComment}{C\+X\+Comment}}}). A comment node can be considered block content (e. g., paragraph), inline content (plain text) or neither (the root A\+ST node). 

\begin{DoxyEnumFields}{Enumerator}
\raisebox{\heightof{T}}[0pt][0pt]{\index{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Null@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Null}!Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}}\index{Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}!C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Null@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Null}}}\mbox{\Hypertarget{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221a4c161a2e9ceb68e886a4200bc1ff1102}\label{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221a4c161a2e9ceb68e886a4200bc1ff1102}} 
C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Null&Null comment. No A\+ST node is constructed at the requested location because there is no text or a syntax error. \\
\hline

\raisebox{\heightof{T}}[0pt][0pt]{\index{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Text@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Text}!Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}}\index{Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}!C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Text@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Text}}}\mbox{\Hypertarget{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221a14989e202e072cc4036fbc5b2e154fe1}\label{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221a14989e202e072cc4036fbc5b2e154fe1}} 
C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Text&Plain text. Inline content. \\
\hline

\raisebox{\heightof{T}}[0pt][0pt]{\index{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Inline\+Command@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Inline\+Command}!Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}}\index{Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}!C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Inline\+Command@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Inline\+Command}}}\mbox{\Hypertarget{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221af38c7e8ed99b72504cf6a2f89a6c9212}\label{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221af38c7e8ed99b72504cf6a2f89a6c9212}} 
C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Inline\+Command&A command with word-\/like arguments that is considered inline content. For example\+: \textbackslash{}c command. \\
\hline

\raisebox{\heightof{T}}[0pt][0pt]{\index{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+H\+T\+M\+L\+Start\+Tag@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+H\+T\+M\+L\+Start\+Tag}!Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}}\index{Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}!C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+H\+T\+M\+L\+Start\+Tag@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+H\+T\+M\+L\+Start\+Tag}}}\mbox{\Hypertarget{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221af266668eef41546725c4a5468f157bfe}\label{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221af266668eef41546725c4a5468f157bfe}} 
C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+H\+T\+M\+L\+Start\+Tag&H\+T\+ML start tag with attributes (name-\/value pairs). Considered inline content. For example\+: \begin{DoxyVerb}* <br> <br /> <a href="http://example.org/">
* \end{DoxyVerb}
 \\
\hline

\raisebox{\heightof{T}}[0pt][0pt]{\index{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+H\+T\+M\+L\+End\+Tag@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+H\+T\+M\+L\+End\+Tag}!Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}}\index{Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}!C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+H\+T\+M\+L\+End\+Tag@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+H\+T\+M\+L\+End\+Tag}}}\mbox{\Hypertarget{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221a4b0d964d2cbee7ec5be119b8d4911f85}\label{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221a4b0d964d2cbee7ec5be119b8d4911f85}} 
C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+H\+T\+M\+L\+End\+Tag&H\+T\+ML end tag. Considered inline content. For example\+: \begin{DoxyVerb}* </a>
* \end{DoxyVerb}
 \\
\hline

\raisebox{\heightof{T}}[0pt][0pt]{\index{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Paragraph@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Paragraph}!Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}}\index{Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}!C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Paragraph@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Paragraph}}}\mbox{\Hypertarget{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221aa9b0c8f429c7eb69d7942a9d51bc02ed}\label{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221aa9b0c8f429c7eb69d7942a9d51bc02ed}} 
C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Paragraph&A paragraph, contains inline comment. The paragraph itself is block content. \\
\hline

\raisebox{\heightof{T}}[0pt][0pt]{\index{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Block\+Command@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Block\+Command}!Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}}\index{Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}!C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Block\+Command@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Block\+Command}}}\mbox{\Hypertarget{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221ad31c09bcc3d5e8db68d4f75e6abe8a73}\label{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221ad31c09bcc3d5e8db68d4f75e6abe8a73}} 
C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Block\+Command&A command that has zero or more word-\/like arguments (number of word-\/like arguments depends on command name) and a paragraph as an argument. Block command is block content. Paragraph argument is also a child of the block command.

For example\+: \textbackslash{}brief has 0 word-\/like arguments and a paragraph argument.

A\+ST nodes of special kinds that parser knows about (e. g., \textbackslash{}param command) have their own node kinds. \\
\hline

\raisebox{\heightof{T}}[0pt][0pt]{\index{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Param\+Command@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Param\+Command}!Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}}\index{Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}!C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Param\+Command@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Param\+Command}}}\mbox{\Hypertarget{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221aa56a1789afc036fcb85cd6a906caf3f6}\label{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221aa56a1789afc036fcb85cd6a906caf3f6}} 
C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Param\+Command&A \textbackslash{}param or \textbackslash{}arg command that describes the function parameter (name, passing direction, description). For example\+: \textbackslash{}param \mbox{[}in\mbox{]} Param\+Name description. \\
\hline

\raisebox{\heightof{T}}[0pt][0pt]{\index{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+T\+Param\+Command@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+T\+Param\+Command}!Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}}\index{Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}!C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+T\+Param\+Command@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+T\+Param\+Command}}}\mbox{\Hypertarget{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221ac5e11e85e1a265b9de9a494168ffc3f0}\label{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221ac5e11e85e1a265b9de9a494168ffc3f0}} 
C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+T\+Param\+Command&A \textbackslash{}tparam command that describes a template parameter (name and description). For example\+: \textbackslash{}tparam T description. \\
\hline

\raisebox{\heightof{T}}[0pt][0pt]{\index{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Verbatim\+Block\+Command@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Verbatim\+Block\+Command}!Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}}\index{Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}!C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Verbatim\+Block\+Command@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Verbatim\+Block\+Command}}}\mbox{\Hypertarget{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221ad8536afabadf2bbe0dac69c1b4261cd1}\label{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221ad8536afabadf2bbe0dac69c1b4261cd1}} 
C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Verbatim\+Block\+Command&A verbatim block command (e. g., preformatted code). Verbatim block has an opening and a closing command and contains multiple lines of text ({\ttfamily C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Verbatim\+Block\+Line} child nodes). For example\+: \textbackslash{}verbatim aaa \textbackslash{}endverbatim \\
\hline

\raisebox{\heightof{T}}[0pt][0pt]{\index{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Verbatim\+Block\+Line@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Verbatim\+Block\+Line}!Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}}\index{Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}!C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Verbatim\+Block\+Line@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Verbatim\+Block\+Line}}}\mbox{\Hypertarget{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221aa1d4e0983dba3fad5b33af95524ab486}\label{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221aa1d4e0983dba3fad5b33af95524ab486}} 
C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Verbatim\+Block\+Line&A line of text that is contained within a C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Verbatim\+Block\+Command node. \\
\hline

\raisebox{\heightof{T}}[0pt][0pt]{\index{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Verbatim\+Line@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Verbatim\+Line}!Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}}\index{Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}!C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Verbatim\+Line@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Verbatim\+Line}}}\mbox{\Hypertarget{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221af8bbe87a5d0d110c211efdb3c340bf8c}\label{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221af8bbe87a5d0d110c211efdb3c340bf8c}} 
C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Verbatim\+Line&A verbatim line command. Verbatim line has an opening command, a single line of text (up to the newline after the opening command) and has no closing command. \\
\hline

\raisebox{\heightof{T}}[0pt][0pt]{\index{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Full\+Comment@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Full\+Comment}!Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}}\index{Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}!C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Full\+Comment@{C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Full\+Comment}}}\mbox{\Hypertarget{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221a959bdb92ff045c50926b6fb5761a2518}\label{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gga3c336d80551401fde394b84aa5651221a959bdb92ff045c50926b6fb5761a2518}} 
C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Full\+Comment&A full comment attached to a declaration, contains block content. \\
\hline

\index{Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}!clang\+\_\+\+Comment\+\_\+is\+Whitespace@{clang\+\_\+\+Comment\+\_\+is\+Whitespace}}
\index{clang\+\_\+\+Comment\+\_\+is\+Whitespace@{clang\+\_\+\+Comment\+\_\+is\+Whitespace}!Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}}
\subsubsection{\texorpdfstring{clang\+\_\+\+Comment\+\_\+is\+Whitespace()}{clang\_Comment\_isWhitespace()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily C\+I\+N\+D\+E\+X\+\_\+\+L\+I\+N\+K\+A\+GE unsigned clang\+\_\+\+Comment\+\_\+is\+Whitespace (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{\mbox{\hyperlink{structCXComment}{C\+X\+Comment}}}]{Comment }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



A {\ttfamily C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Paragraph} node is considered whitespace if it contains only {\ttfamily C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Text} nodes that are empty or whitespace. 

Other A\+ST nodes (except {\ttfamily C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Paragraph} and {\ttfamily C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Text}) are never considered whitespace.

\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
non-\/zero if {\ttfamily Comment} is whitespace. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
\mbox{\Hypertarget{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gafdfc03bbfdddd06c380a2644f16ccba9}\label{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_gafdfc03bbfdddd06c380a2644f16ccba9}} 
\index{Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}!clang\+\_\+\+Full\+Comment\+\_\+get\+As\+H\+T\+ML@{clang\+\_\+\+Full\+Comment\+\_\+get\+As\+H\+T\+ML}}
\index{clang\+\_\+\+Full\+Comment\+\_\+get\+As\+H\+T\+ML@{clang\+\_\+\+Full\+Comment\+\_\+get\+As\+H\+T\+ML}!Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}}
\subsubsection{\texorpdfstring{clang\+\_\+\+Full\+Comment\+\_\+get\+As\+H\+T\+M\+L()}{clang\_FullComment\_getAsHTML()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily C\+I\+N\+D\+E\+X\+\_\+\+L\+I\+N\+K\+A\+GE \mbox{\hyperlink{structCXString}{C\+X\+String}} clang\+\_\+\+Full\+Comment\+\_\+get\+As\+H\+T\+ML (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{\mbox{\hyperlink{structCXComment}{C\+X\+Comment}}}]{Comment }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



Convert a given full parsed comment to an H\+T\+ML fragment. 

Specific details of H\+T\+ML layout are subject to change. Don\textquotesingle{}t try to parse this H\+T\+ML back into an A\+ST, use other A\+P\+Is instead.

Currently the following C\+SS classes are used\+: \begin{DoxyItemize}
\item \char`\"{}para-\/brief\char`\"{} for \textbackslash{}brief paragraph and equivalent commands; \item \char`\"{}para-\/returns\char`\"{} for \textbackslash{}returns paragraph and equivalent commands; \item \char`\"{}word-\/returns\char`\"{} for the \char`\"{}\+Returns\char`\"{} word in \textbackslash{}returns paragraph.\end{DoxyItemize}
Function argument documentation is rendered as a $<$dl$>$ list with arguments sorted in function prototype order. C\+SS classes used\+: \begin{DoxyItemize}
\item \char`\"{}param-\/name-\/index-\/\+N\+U\+M\+B\+E\+R\char`\"{} for parameter name ($<$dt$>$); \item \char`\"{}param-\/descr-\/index-\/\+N\+U\+M\+B\+E\+R\char`\"{} for parameter description ($<$dd$>$); \item \char`\"{}param-\/name-\/index-\/invalid\char`\"{} and \char`\"{}param-\/descr-\/index-\/invalid\char`\"{} are used if parameter index is invalid.\end{DoxyItemize}
Template parameter documentation is rendered as a $<$dl$>$ list with parameters sorted in template parameter list order. C\+SS classes used\+: \begin{DoxyItemize}
\item \char`\"{}tparam-\/name-\/index-\/\+N\+U\+M\+B\+E\+R\char`\"{} for parameter name ($<$dt$>$); \item \char`\"{}tparam-\/descr-\/index-\/\+N\+U\+M\+B\+E\+R\char`\"{} for parameter description ($<$dd$>$); \item \char`\"{}tparam-\/name-\/index-\/other\char`\"{} and \char`\"{}tparam-\/descr-\/index-\/other\char`\"{} are used for names inside template template parameters; \item \char`\"{}tparam-\/name-\/index-\/invalid\char`\"{} and \char`\"{}tparam-\/descr-\/index-\/invalid\char`\"{} are used if parameter position is invalid.\end{DoxyItemize}

\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em Comment} & a {\ttfamily C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+Full\+Comment} A\+ST node.\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
string containing an H\+T\+ML fragment. 
\end{DoxyReturn}

\subsubsection{\texorpdfstring{clang\+\_\+\+T\+Param\+Command\+Comment\+\_\+get\+Depth()}{clang\_TParamCommandComment\_getDepth()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily C\+I\+N\+D\+E\+X\+\_\+\+L\+I\+N\+K\+A\+GE unsigned clang\+\_\+\+T\+Param\+Command\+Comment\+\_\+get\+Depth (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{\mbox{\hyperlink{structCXComment}{C\+X\+Comment}}}]{Comment }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em Comment} & a {\ttfamily C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+T\+Param\+Command} A\+ST node.\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
zero-\/based nesting depth of this parameter in the template parameter list.
\end{DoxyReturn}
For example, \begin{DoxyVerb}*     template<typename C, template<typename T> class TT>
*     void test(TT<int> aaa);
* \end{DoxyVerb}
 for C and TT nesting depth is 0, for T nesting depth is 1. \mbox{\Hypertarget{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_ga0b91d26f02a476076b6dc5b5eea59a8f}\label{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_ga0b91d26f02a476076b6dc5b5eea59a8f}} 
\index{Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}!clang\+\_\+\+T\+Param\+Command\+Comment\+\_\+get\+Index@{clang\+\_\+\+T\+Param\+Command\+Comment\+\_\+get\+Index}}
\index{clang\+\_\+\+T\+Param\+Command\+Comment\+\_\+get\+Index@{clang\+\_\+\+T\+Param\+Command\+Comment\+\_\+get\+Index}!Comment introspection@{Comment introspection}}
\subsubsection{\texorpdfstring{clang\+\_\+\+T\+Param\+Command\+Comment\+\_\+get\+Index()}{clang\_TParamCommandComment\_getIndex()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily C\+I\+N\+D\+E\+X\+\_\+\+L\+I\+N\+K\+A\+GE unsigned clang\+\_\+\+T\+Param\+Command\+Comment\+\_\+get\+Index (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{\mbox{\hyperlink{structCXComment}{C\+X\+Comment}}}]{Comment,  }\item[{unsigned}]{Depth }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}


\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em Comment} & a {\ttfamily C\+X\+Comment\+\_\+\+T\+Param\+Command} A\+ST node.\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
zero-\/based parameter index in the template parameter list at a given nesting depth.
\end{DoxyReturn}
For example, \begin{DoxyVerb}*     template<typename C, template<typename T> class TT>
*     void test(TT<int> aaa);
* \end{DoxyVerb}
 for C and TT nesting depth is 0, so we can ask for index at depth 0\+: at depth 0 C\textquotesingle{}s index is 0, TT\textquotesingle{}s index is 1.

For T nesting depth is 1, so we can ask for index at depth 0 and 1\+: at depth 0 T\textquotesingle{}s index is 1 (same as TT\textquotesingle{}s), at depth 1 T\textquotesingle{}s index is 0. \mbox{\Hypertarget{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_ga01f61f1d0dabcaf806eb1b9f21e5e340}\label{group__CINDEX__COMMENT_ga01f61f1d0dabcaf806eb1b9f21e5e340}}
